General.Name: Jinan Shengquan Group Share Holding Co Ltd
General.Description: Jinan Shengquan Group Share Holding Co., Ltd. engages in the research, development, production, and sales of synthetic resins and composite materials, biomass chemical materials, and related products in China and internationally. The company offers biomass refining, such as cellulose, hemicellulose, and lignin; resins and composite materials, including phenolic resin, carbon material phenolic resin, electronic chemicals, electrical materials, and transportation and building composites; casting materials, such as binder, coating, filter, riser, and other products; pharmaceutical intermediates and fine chemicals; and new energy products. Jinan Shengquan Group Share Holding Co., Ltd. was founded in 1979 and is headquartered in Jinan, China.
